## Main Analysis

```{r}
volume_perc |>
  filter(Year == "2006") |>
  ggplot(
    aes(x = reorder(Category, Imports), 
        y = Imports,
        fill = Category)) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "turbo") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank()) +
  labs(
    title = "Percent Change U.S. Food Import Volume by Category, 2005-2006",
    x = "",
    y = "Percent Change")
```
